item.description: This item starts a level after a given delay or when the user presses a key.

field.name: delayed_level_loading.delay
field.description: Minimum number of seconds of delay before starting the level.

field.name: delayed_level_loading.fade_duration
field.description: The duration of the fading effect before starting the level.

field.name: delayed_level_loading.load_on_input
field.description: Tell if the level must starts before the end of the delay if the user presses a key.

field.name: delayed_level_loading.level
field.description: The path of the level to start, or the name of a game variable containing this path.

field.name: delayed_level_loading.transition_layer_name
field.description: The name of the transition layer receiving the fade effect.
